GSD.product_version: versions from v4.0 to before v4.9.327
GSD.description:
kprobes: don't call disarm_kprobe() for disabled kprobes

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.327 by commit 19cd630712e7c13a3dedfc6986a9b983fed6fd98, it was introduced in version v4.0 by commit 69d54b916d83872a0a327778a01af2a096923f59. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: kprobes: don't call disarm_kprobe() for disabled kprobes
